sentences.en: "Keep him outside till I give you the nod."
sentences.cn: “没我同意，别让他进来。”

sentences.en: "Probably," agreed Hunter, with a slow nod of his head.
sentences.cn: 亨特慢慢点了点头,表示赞同地说:“很有可能.”

sentences.en: A nod's as good as a wink , she was sacked for incompetence.
sentences.cn: 不用多说, 她因不称职而被解雇.

sentences.en: A quick nod of approval would have done nicely.
sentences.cn: 要是当时立即点头同意就好了。

sentences.en: Big issues are going through on the nod.
sentences.cn: 重大议题将会一致通过。

sentences.en: Don't let yon dog nod off.
sentences.cn: 不要让那条狗打盹。

sentences.en: Dr Sinclair's affirmative nod seemed a shade reluctant.
sentences.cn: 辛克莱博士虽然点头表示了同意，但还显得有点不情愿。

sentences.en: From time to time, she gave him an encouraging nod.
sentences.cn: 她不时对他点头鼓励.

sentences.en: He gave me an approving nod.
sentences.cn: 他向我点头表示同意。

sentences.en: He gave Sabrina a quick nod of acknowledgement.
sentences.cn: 他朝萨布里娜快速点点头,示意看到了她.

sentences.en: He intimated his wishes with a slight nod of his head.
sentences.cn: 他微微点头示意.

sentences.en: He turned with a little nod and I watched him walk away.
sentences.cn: 他边点了点头边转过身，我看着他走了。

sentences.en: I asked her if she was ready to go, and she nodded.
sentences.cn: 我问她是否已准备好出发，她点了点头。

sentences.en: I showed the doorman my card and he gave a friendly nod.
sentences.cn: 我向门卫出示了卡片，他友善地点了点头。

sentences.en: Mom nodded her head sympathetically.
sentences.cn: 妈妈同情地点了点头。

sentences.en: parliamentary approval of the treaty went through on the nod.
sentences.cn: 议会点头通过了该条约。

sentences.en: She gave a nod and said, "I see"
sentences.cn: 她点了点头说:“我明白了.”

sentences.en: some of the congregation nodded off during the sermon.
sentences.cn: 在布道集会上有些人打起了瞌睡。

sentences.en: students will need &B{a nodding acquaintance with} three other languages.
sentences.cn: 学生需要对其他三种语言略知一二。

sentences.en: Taylor leapt up to nod the ball home.
sentences.cn: 泰勒跳起来头球破门。

sentences.en: the DTI nodded through the bid from Airtours.
sentences.cn: 贸易工业部点头通过了空旅公司的投标。

sentences.en: The Monsignor gave him a slow, expressionless nod.
sentences.cn: 教士阁下毫无表情地朝他慢慢点了下头。

sentences.en: The woman greeted us with a nod of the head.
sentences.cn: 那个女人向我们点点头打招呼。

sentences.en: they banned one book but gave the other the nod.
sentences.cn: 他们查禁了一本书却批准了另一本。

words.tran_cn: 点头的，低垂的；昏昏欲睡的

phrases.phrase: a nod's as good as a wink to a blind horse

phrases.tran_cn: （与某人）点头之交；（对某物）略知一二
(非正式)未经讨论而一致通过

phrases.phrase: on the nod Brit. informal 英，非正式

trans.tran_cn: 点头，点头示意，打盹，顶球
trans.tran_en: to move your head up and down, especially in order to show agreement or understanding
to move your head up and down, especially in order to show agreement or understanding
